Trigger.name: Test
Trigger.script:
local directions = {north = "^^", east = ">>", south = "vv", west = "<<", up = "uu", down = "dd"} local colors = {trolloc = "ansi_red", myrddraal = "ansi_red", human = "ansi_cyan", seanchan = "ansi_magenta"}
if colors[matches[2]] then creplaceLine( "<brown>There are some tracks of a <" ..colors[matches[2]]..">".. string.upper(matches[2]) .. "<brown> leaving " .. matches[3] .. ". " .. directions[matches[3]] ) end

regexCodeList.string: ^You say 'There are some tracks of a (.+) leaving (.+)\.'$

TriggerGroup.name: Catch Name
TriggerGroup.script:
--check that the line is not an immortal speaking (the only other possibility for a whole line being cyan) if (line == matches[1] or string.find(line, " > "..matches[1], 1, true)) and not ( string.find(line, "speaks from the") or string.find(line, "answers your prayer") ) then wotmudmapper.roomname = matches[1] wotmudmapper.roomdesc = "" wotmudmapper.brief = true if wotmudmapper.dark then wotmudmapper.dark = false end wotmudmapper:echo("\nRoom name (" .. wotmudmapper.roomname .. ") captured.", true)
if table.contains( { "At a Vine-Carved Door", "Approaching a Vine-Carved Door", "Twisting Through the Ways", "An Island in Darkness", "An Island in the Ways", }, wotmudmapper.roomname ) then wotmudmapper.inways = true else wotmudmapper.inways = false end enableTrigger("Map Description") end

regexCodeList.string: FG14BG-2

TriggerGroup.name: Map Description
TriggerGroup.script: --if line is not the roomname and not the exit line, add to room description if matches[2] ~= wotmudmapper.roomname and not string.find(line, "obvious exits:") then if wotmudmapper.brief then wotmudmapper.brief = false end if wotmudmapper.roomdesc == "" then wotmudmapper.roomdesc = line else wotmudmapper.roomdesc = wotmudmapper.roomdesc .. "\n" .. line end if wotmudmapper.configs.mapbrief and not isLook(wotmudmapper.queue:checkleftvalue()) then deleteLine() end setTriggerStayOpen("Catch Name", 1) end

Trigger.name: Get Exits
Trigger.script:
disableTrigger("Map Description")
--puts current exits in a table of the form {"n","e","s","w","u","d"} wotmudmapper.roomexits = string.lower(matches[2]) wotmudmapper:echo("
Room exits (" .. wotmudmapper.roomexits .. ") captured.
", true) wotmudmapper.roomexits = string.split(wotmudmapper.roomexits) while table.index_of(wotmudmapper.roomexits, "") do table.remove(wotmudmapper.roomexits, table.index_of(wotmudmapper.roomexits, "")) end
local mapCommand, x, y, z, lastID, tempID --Specifying the type of movement. If not fleeing or following, then take from queue if not wotmudmapper.flee and not wotmudmapper.following then mapCommand = wotmudmapper.queue:popleft() else --else, fleeing or following if wotmudmapper.following then --treat following as a flee movement mapCommand = "f" --setting following at false for the following map movement wotmudmapper.following = false else --checking if next command in line is flee mapCommand = wotmudmapper.queue:checkleftvalue() --if yes, then take command from queue if isFlee(mapCommand) then wotmudmapper.queue:popleft() else --if no, then it is autowimpy flee mapCommand = "f" end --setting flee at false for the following map movement wotmudmapper.flee = false end end --finished specifying if movement was regular or a flee --loading the previous roomID. lastID = wotmudmapper.currentID local newID = {} --if mapCommand is a direction and you were in a valid room if isMovement(mapCommand) and (not table.is_empty(lastID)) then --if mapping and you were in a unique room if wotmudmapper.configs.mapping and table.size(lastID) == 1 then tempID = wotmudmapper:findRoom(wotmudmapper.roomname, wotmudmapper.roomdesc, wotmudmapper.roomexits) --if not in an already mapped room or if forcing a room if table.is_empty(tempID) or wotmudmapper.configs.forceroom then x, y, z = getRoomCoordinates(lastID[1]) x, y, z = wotmudmapper:setCoordinatesOffset(x, y, z, mapCommand) wotmudmapper.currentID = wotmudmapper:createRoom(x, y, z, getRoomArea(lastID[1])) wotmudmapper:linkRooms(lastID[1], wotmudmapper.currentID[1], mapCommand, wotmudmapper.roomexits) if wotmudmapper.configs.autojoin then wotmudmapper:autoJoinRooms(wotmudmapper.currentID[1]) end wotmudmapper.configs.forceroom = false --if in a known room, link with previous room elseif table.size(tempID) == 1 and tempID[1] ~= lastID[1] then wotmudmapper.currentID = tempID wotmudmapper:linkRooms(lastID[1], wotmudmapper.currentID[1], mapCommand, wotmudmapper.roomexits) --else, you're just moving around in mapping mode else newID = wotmudmapper:isNearRoom( mapCommand, wotmudmapper.roomname, wotmudmapper.roomdesc, getRoomExits(lastID[1]) ) if table.is_empty(newID) then newID = tempID elseif table.size(newID) > 1 and (not table.is_empty(wotmudmapper:findMatchingExits(newID, wotmudmapper.roomexits))) then newID = wotmudmapper:findMatchingExits(newID, wotmudmapper.roomexits) end wotmudmapper.currentID = newID end --else, you're just moving around in non-mapping mode or with multiple potential rooms else for k, v in pairs(lastID) do local rooms = wotmudmapper:isNearRoom(mapCommand, wotmudmapper.roomname, wotmudmapper.roomdesc, getRoomExits(v)) if not table.contains(newID, rooms[1]) then table.insert(newID, rooms[1]) end end if table.is_empty(newID) then newID = wotmudmapper:findRoom(wotmudmapper.roomname, wotmudmapper.roomdesc, wotmudmapper.roomexits) elseif table.size(newID) > 1 and (not table.is_empty(wotmudmapper:findMatchingExits(newID, wotmudmapper.roomexits))) then newID = wotmudmapper:findMatchingExits(newID, wotmudmapper.roomexits) end wotmudmapper.currentID = newID end --handling flees elseif isFlee(mapCommand) and (not table.is_empty(lastID)) then for k, v in pairs(lastID) do local rooms = wotmudmapper:findRoomAfterFlee( wotmudmapper.roomname, wotmudmapper.roomdesc, wotmudmapper.roomexits, getRoomExits(v) ) for kk, vv in pairs(rooms) do if not table.contains(newID, vv) then table.insert(newID, vv) end end end if table.is_empty(newID) then newID = wotmudmapper:findRoom(wotmudmapper.roomname, wotmudmapper.roomdesc, wotmudmapper.roomexits) elseif table.size(newID) > 1 and (not table.is_empty(wotmudmapper:findMatchingExits(newID, wotmudmapper.roomexits))) then newID = wotmudmapper:findMatchingExits(newID, wotmudmapper.roomexits) end wotmudmapper.currentID = newID --if not looking at room and data is same, search for room elseif not (isLook(mapCommand) and table.size(lastID) == 1 and wotmudmapper.roomname == getRoomName(lastID[1]) and wotmudmapper.roomdesc == getRoomUserData(lastID[1], "description")) then wotmudmapper.currentID = wotmudmapper:findRoom(wotmudmapper.roomname, wotmudmapper.roomdesc, wotmudmapper.roomexits) end
if table.is_empty(wotmudmapper.currentID) then wotmudmapper:echo("
No matches found.", false, true) elseif table.size(wotmudmapper.currentID) > 1 then wotmudmapper:echo("
Multiple matches found.", false, true) else centerview(wotmudmapper.currentID[1])
--note room exits that lead to unknown rooms (as they may be DTs) local safe_rooms = {} for k,v in pairs(getRoomExits(wotmudmapper.currentID[1])) do table.insert(safe_rooms, string.sub(k,1,1)) end local unsafe_rooms = table.n_complement(wotmudmapper.roomexits, safe_rooms) if getExitStubs(wotmudmapper.currentID[1]) then for k, v in pairs(getExitStubs(wotmudmapper.currentID[1])) do if not table.contains(unsafe_rooms,string.sub(wotmudmapper.exitmap[v],1,1)) then table.insert(unsafe_rooms,string.sub(wotmudmapper.exitmap[v],1,1)) end end end for k,v in pairs(unsafe_rooms) do wotmudmapper:echo( "
Caution. Direction " .. v .. " leads to an unknown room.", false, true ) end
--displaying the zone wotmudmapper.zone = getRoomUserData(wotmudmapper.currentID[1], "zone") if wotmudmapper.configs.showzone then cechoLink("
<"..wotmudmapper.configs.zonecolor..">Zone: " .. wotmudmapper.zone, function() if wotmudmapper.zone ~= "" then if wotmudmapper.zone_urls[wotmudmapper.zone] ~= "" then openUrl("https://wotmud.fandom.com/wiki/"..wotmudmapper.zone_urls[wotmudmapper.zone]) end end end, "Click to open the WoTMUD wiki page for this zone", true) end
--showing the doors that have been stored for k, v in pairs({"north", "east", "south", "west", "up", "down"}) do local dir = string.sub(v, 1, 1) if getRoomUserData(wotmudmapper.currentID[1], dir) ~= "" then cecho("
<"..wotmudmapper.configs.doorcolor..">Door " .. v .. ": <white>" .. getRoomUserData(wotmudmapper.currentID[1], dir)) end end end

Trigger.name: Hurricane/Fireworks movement
Trigger.script:
wotmudmapper.currentID={}
for k, v in pairs(getRooms()) do if getRoomUserData(k, "zone") == wotmudmapper.zone then table.insert(wotmudmapper.currentID, k) end end

regexCodeList.string: A hurricane force wind lifts you off the ground!$
\*KERBOOM\* The explosion rips you from the ground and tosses you through the air\.$

Trigger.name: Movement Failure
Trigger.script: local mapCommand = wotmudmapper.queue:popleft() if wotmudmapper.following then wotmudmapper.following = false end --reduce possible roommatches based on fact that a direction doesn't work if matches[1] == "Alas, you cannot go that way..." then if table.size(wotmudmapper.currentID) > 1 then local roommatches = {} for k, v in pairs(wotmudmapper.currentID) do --initialiasing table local exitkeys = {} --create table of exit keys (grabbing first letter of "north","south",etc.) for kk, vv in pairs(getRoomExits(v)) do table.insert(exitkeys, string.sub(kk, 1, 1)) end --if there are exit stubs leading to unmapped room, include those if getExitStubs(v) then for kk, vv in pairs(getExitStubs(v)) do table.insert(exitkeys, string.sub(wotmudmapper.exitmap[vv], 1, 1)) end end --compare list of possible exits to exit that failed --if possible exits doesn't contain direction that failed OR has a door (which could be hidden, and closed) --then that room is a possible match if (not table.contains(exitkeys, mapCommand)) or getRoomUserData(v, mapCommand) ~= "" then table.insert(roommatches, v) end end wotmudmapper.currentID = roommatches end end if table.size(wotmudmapper.currentID) == 1 then centerview(wotmudmapper.currentID[1]) end

Trigger.name: Doors in General
Trigger.script: local mapCommand = wotmudmapper.queue:popleft() local direction if mapCommand == wotmudmapper.door and mapCommand then direction = wotmudmapper.door elseif mapCommand then direction = mapCommand else direction = wotmudmapper.door end if wotmudmapper.configs.mapping and table.size(wotmudmapper.currentID) == 1 and getRoomUserData(wotmudmapper.currentID[1], direction) == "" then wotmudmapper:createDoor(wotmudmapper.currentID[1], direction, 1, matches[2]) end if wotmudmapper.following then wotmudmapper.following = false end --if door was closed, use it to narrow down possible roommatches if table.contains( { "The " .. matches[2] .. " is closed.", "The " .. matches[2] .. " seems to be closed.", "> The " .. matches[2] .. " is closed.", "> The " .. matches[2] .. " seems to be closed.", }, matches[1] ) then --only try to narrow down results if room isn't already known if table.size(wotmudmapper.currentID) > 1 then local roommatches = {} --grab all possible exits from the room for k, v in pairs(wotmudmapper.currentID) do ---initialiasing table local exitkeys = {} ---create table of exit keys (grabbing first letter of "north","south",etc.) for kk, vv in pairs(getRoomExits(v)) do table.insert(exitkeys, string.sub(kk, 1, 1)) end ---if there are exit stubs leading to unmapped room, include those if getExitStubs(v) then for kk, vv in pairs(getExitStubs(v)) do table.insert(exitkeys, string.sub(wotmudmapper.exitmap[vv], 1, 1)) end end --if room has door in direction entered, add to potential matches if getRoomUserData(v, mapCommand) ~= "" then table.insert(roommatches, v) end end wotmudmapper.currentID = roommatches end end if table.size(wotmudmapper.currentID) == 1 then centerview(wotmudmapper.currentID[1]) end

Trigger.name: "Where" clickable centerroom
Trigger.script:
local roomname = matches[2] local foundrooms = searchRoom(roomname, true, true) local roomID
for k, v in pairs(foundrooms) do if getRoomUserData(k, "zone") ~= wotmudmapper.zone then foundrooms[k] = nil end end
if table.is_empty(foundrooms) then selectCaptureGroup(2) setLink(function() end, "No matches found!") elseif table.size(foundrooms) == 1 then for k, v in pairs(foundrooms) do selectCaptureGroup(2) setLink(function() centerview(k) end, "Click to center map on room.") end else selectCaptureGroup(2) setLink(function() for k,v in spairs(foundrooms) do echoLink("Room ID: " .. k .. "\n", function() centerview(k) end, "Click to center map on room.",true) end end, "Click to display rooms with matching name.") end

end

Trigger.name: Bleeding
Trigger.script:
statusbar = statusbar or {} char = char or {} char.maxhealth = char.maxhealth or 0 local temphp = "HP"
if char.health then char.health = math.min(char.health, math.floor(0.2 * char.maxhealth)) temphp = "HP: " .. char.health .. "(" .. char.maxhealth .. ")" elseif char.healthestmax and char.healthestmin and char.healthestmin ~= "???" then char.healthestmax = math.min(char.healthestmax, math.floor(0.2 * char.maxhealth)) char.healthestmin = math.min(char.healthestmin, math.floor(0.2 * char.maxhealth)) if char.healthestmin == char.healthestmax then temphp = "HP: " .. char.healthestmax .. "(" .. char.maxhealth .. ")" else temphp = "HP: " .. char.healthestmin .. "-" .. char.healthestmax .. "(" .. char.maxhealth .. ")" end elseif char.healthestmax and char.healthestmin == "???" then char.healthestmax = math.min(char.healthestmax, math.floor(0.2 * char.maxhealth)) if char.healthestmin == char.healthestmax then temphp = "HP: " .. char.healthestmax .. "(" .. char.maxhealth .. ")" else temphp = "HP: " .. char.healthestmin .. "-" .. char.healthestmax .. "(" .. char.maxhealth .. ")" end end if statusbar.health then statusbar.health:echo(temphp, "white", "c") end

local code = matches[2]
char = char or {} weaving = weaving or {} gatecodes = {}
if char.name then if io.exists(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/"..char.name.."_gatecodes.lua") then table.load(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/"..char.name.."_gatecodes.lua", gatecodes) end if weaving.gatename then gatecodes[weaving.gatename] = code table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/"..char.name.."_gatecodes.lua", gatecodes) cecho( "
<green>Code '" .. code .. "' successfully stored to location '" .. weaving.gatename .. "'." ) else cecho("
<red>Unknown error! No location set to store code to.") end send("release") else cecho("
<red>Error! Character name not known.") end

wotpack_installer:echo("Downloading updated installer...\n") local url="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/weisluke/WoTMUD/master/wotpack_installer.mpackage" local saveto = getMudletHomeDir() .. "/wotpack_installer.mpackage" downloadFile(saveto, url)

Alias.name: Install All
Alias.script:
--syntax: wotpack install all
for k, v in pairs(wotpack_installer) do if type(v) == "table" then for kk, vv in pairs(v) do local fname,ftype = vv:match("(.+)_(.+)") WoTPackDownloadInstall(fname, ftype) end end end

Alias.name: Uninstall All
Alias.script:
--syntax: wotpack uninstall xxx yyy
for k, v in pairs(wotpack_installer) do if type(v) == "table" then for kk, vv in pairs(v) do uninstallPackage(vv) wotpack_installer:echo(vv.." uninstalled.\n") end end end

Alias.name: Install
Alias.script:
--syntax: wotpack install xxx yyy OR wotpack install xxx
if matches[5] then local fname = matches[6] fname = fname:gsub(" ", "_"):lower() if fname ~= "all" then local is_package = false for k, v in pairs(wotpack_installer) do if type(v) == "table" then local ftype = k if table.contains(wotpack_installer[ftype], fname .. "_" .. ftype) then is_package = true WoTPackDownloadInstall(fname, ftype) end end end if not is_package then wotpack_installer:echo( "Package " .. fname .. " not known. View files available for download with \"wotpack view files\"\n", true ) end end else local fname = matches[3] fname = fname:gsub(" ", "_"):lower() local ftype = matches[4] if table.contains(wotpack_installer[ftype], fname .. "_" .. ftype) then WoTPackDownloadInstall(fname, ftype) else wotpack_installer:echo( "File " .. fname .. "_" .. ftype .. " not known. View files available for download with \"wotpack view files\"\n", true ) end end

Alias.name: Uninstall
Alias.script:
--syntax: wotpack uninstall xxx yyy OR wotpack uninstall xxx
if matches[5] then local fname = matches[6] fname = fname:gsub(" ", "_"):lower() local is_package = false for k, v in pairs(wotpack_installer) do if type(v) == "table" then local ftype = k if table.contains(wotpack_installer[ftype], fname .. "_" .. ftype) then is_package = true uninstallPackage(fname .. "_" .. ftype) wotpack_installer:echo(fname .. "_" .. k .. " uninstalled.
") end end end if not is_package then wotpack_installer:echo( "Package " .. fname .. " not known. View files available for download with "wotpack view files"
", true ) end else local fname = matches[3] fname = fname:gsub(" ", "_"):lower() local ftype = matches[4] if table.contains(wotpack_installer[ftype], fname .. "_" .. ftype) then uninstallPackage(fname.."_"..ftype) wotpack_installer:echo(fname .. "_" .. ftype .. " uninstalled.
") else wotpack_installer:echo( "File " .. fname .. "_" .. ftype .. " not known. View files available for download with "wotpack view files"
", true ) end end

Alias.name: Create a New Area

--syntax: createarea xxx

Alias.name: Create a Room at Areaname
Alias.script:
--syntax: createroom areaname
local areaID = addAreaName(matches[2])
if areaID and wotmudmapper.roomname~="" then wotmudmapper.currentID = wotmudmapper:createRoom(0, 0, 0, areaID) wotmudmapper:echo("New room created.
") centerview(wotmudmapper.currentID[1]) elseif wotmudmapper.roomname~="" then wotmudmapper.currentID = wotmudmapper:createRoom(0, 0, 0, matches[2]) wotmudmapper:echo("New room created.
") centerview(wotmudmapper.currentID[1]) else wotmudmapper:echo("Current room name not known.
",false,true) end

Alias.name: Move Room to Area
Alias.script:
--syntax: movetoarea xxx
local moved if table.size(wotmudmapper.currentID) == 1 then for k, v in pairs(getAreaTable()) do if k == matches[2] then setRoomArea(wotmudmapper.currentID[1], v) wotmudmapper:echo("Room ("..wotmudmapper.currentID[1]..") moved to area (" .. k .. ").
") moved = true centerview(wotmudmapper.currentID[1]) break end end else wotmudmapper:echo("Current room not known.
",false,true) end if not moved then wotmudmapper:echo("Area ("..matches[2]..") not known.
",false,true) end

Alias.name: Show Rooms in an Area
Alias.script:

Alias.name: Rename Area
Alias.script: --syntax: renamearea IDnumber newname --IDnumber can be found from the "arealist" command local renamed for k, v in pairs(getAreaTable()) do if v == tonumber(matches[2]) then setAreaName(v, matches[3]) wotmudmapper:echo( "Area (" .. k .. ") renamed to (" .. matches[3] .. ").\n" ) renamed = true break end end if not renamed then wotmudmapper:echo("Area ("..matches[2]..") not known.\n", false, true) end

Alias.name: Delete an Area
Alias.script:
--syntax: deletearea xxx
local deleted for k, v in pairs(getAreaTable()) do if k == matches[2] then if type(getMapLabels(v))=="table" then for kk,vv in pairs(getMapLabels(v)) do deleteMapLabel(v,kk) end end deleteArea(v) updateMap() wotmudmapper:echo("Area ("..matches[2]..") deleted. All its rooms, if any, have been deleted.\n") deleted = true break end end if not deleted then wotmudmapper:echo("Area ("..matches[2]..") not known.\n",false,true) end

Alias.name: Delete room

", <gold>value<white>: " .. getRoomUserData(wotmudmapper.currentID[1], v) .. "<reset>\n" ) end else wotmudmapper:echo("Current room not known.\n",false,true) end

", false, true) end else wotmudmapper:echo("Current room not known.
", false, true) end

") deleted.\n") else wotmudmapper:echo("Current room not known.\n",false,true) end

Alias.name: Delete All Room Data
Alias.script: --syntax: deleteallroomdata --This will delete ALL user specific data about a room --This includes clearing out the room description, zone, and doors if table.size(wotmudmapper.currentID) == 1 then clearRoomUserData(wotmudmapper.currentID[1]) wotmudmapper:echo("All room data deleted.\n") else wotmudmapper:echo("Current room not known.\n",false,true) end

--syntax: crz zonename
if table.size(wotmudmapper.currentID) == 1 then setRoomUserData(wotmudmapper.currentID[1], "zone", matches[2]) wotmudmapper.zone = matches[2] wotmudmapper:echo("Zone of current room set to (" .. matches[2] .. ")\n") else wotmudmapper:echo("Current room not known.\n",false,true) end

Alias.name: Change Mapping Zone
Alias.script:
--syntax: cmz zonename
wotmudmapper.zone=matches[2] wotmudmapper:echo("New rooms will be of zone ("..matches[2]..").\n")

Alias.name: Shift room
Alias.script: --syntax: shiftroom direction --shifts the current room in the direction local direction = matches[2] if table.size(wotmudmapper.currentID) == 1 then local x,y,z = getRoomCoordinates(wotmudmapper.currentID[1]) x,y,z = wotmudmapper:setCoordinatesOffset(x, y, z, direction) setRoomCoordinates(wotmudmapper.currentID[1], x, y, z) wotmudmapper:echo("Current room shifted ("..direction..").\n") centerview(wotmudmapper.currentID[1]) else wotmudmapper:echo("Current room not known.\n",false,true) end

Alias.name: Change zone color
Alias.script: local color = matches[2] if color_table[color] then wotmudmapper:echo( "Map (zonecolor) changed from (<" .. wotmudmapper.configs.zonecolor .. ">" .. wotmudmapper.configs.zonecolor .. "<reset>) to (<" .. color .. ">" .. color .. "<reset>).\n" ) wotmudmapper.configs.zonecolor = color table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/wotmudmapper.configs.lua", wotmudmapper.configs) else wotmudmapper:echo("Color not known.\n", false, true) end

Alias.name: Add Room Marker
Alias.script: --syntax: setmarker xxx --adds a one character marker to the room on the map. "setmarker " to clear the marker --(if it's hard to tell, that means type in setmarker followed by one space to clear the room marker) --ex: "setmarker #" will place a "#" symbol on the room in the map if table.size(wotmudmapper.currentID) == 1 then setRoomChar(wotmudmapper.currentID[1], matches[2]) wotmudmapper:echo("Marker ("..matches[2]..") added to current room.\n") updateMap() else wotmudmapper:echo("Current room not known.\n",false,true) end

Alias.name: Creating Doors
Alias.script: --Syntax: create (visible OR hidden OR locked) door direction doorname local doortype = matches[2] local direction = matches[3] local doorname = matches[4] local numtype = {visible=1,hidden=2,locked=3} if table.size(wotmudmapper.currentID) == 1 then wotmudmapper:createDoor(wotmudmapper.currentID[1], direction, numtype[doortype], doorname) else wotmudmapper:echo("Current room not known.\n",false,true) end

Alias.name: Delete Door
Alias.script: --Syntax: deletedoor direction local direction = matches[2] if table.size(wotmudmapper.currentID) == 1 then wotmudmapper:echo("Door ("..direction..") named ("..getRoomUserData(wotmudmapper.currentID[1],direction)..") deleted.\n") wotmudmapper:createDoor(wotmudmapper.currentID[1], direction, 0, "") clearRoomUserDataItem(wotmudmapper.currentID[1], direction) else wotmudmapper:echo("Current room not known.\n",false,true) end

Alias.name: Open Door
Alias.script:
--syntax: odn/ods/ode/odw/odu/odd
if table.size(wotmudmapper.currentID) == 1 then local queue = wotmudmapper.queue local currentID = wotmudmapper.currentID[1] for i = queue.first, queue.last, 1 do local exits = getRoomExits(currentID) for k, v in pairs(exits) do if string.sub(k, 1, 1) == queue[i] then currentID = v end end end local door = getRoomUserData(currentID, matches[2]) send("open " .. door .. " " .. matches[2]) end

Alias.name: Close Door
Alias.script:
--syntax: cdn/cde/cds/cdw/cdu/cdd
if table.size(wotmudmapper.currentID) == 1 then local queue = wotmudmapper.queue local currentID = wotmudmapper.currentID[1] for i = queue.first, queue.last, 1 do local exits = getRoomExits(currentID) for k, v in pairs(exits) do if string.sub(k, 1, 1) == queue[i] then currentID = v end end end local door = getRoomUserData(currentID, matches[2]) send("close " .. door .. " " .. matches[2]) end

" " .. matches[2]) end

" " .. matches[2]) end

Alias.name: Change door color
Alias.script: local color = matches[2] if color_table[color] then wotmudmapper:echo( "Map (doorcolor) changed from (<" .. wotmudmapper.configs.doorcolor .. ">" .. wotmudmapper.configs.doorcolor .. "<reset>) to (<" .. color .. ">" .. color .. "<reset>).\n" ) wotmudmapper.configs.doorcolor = color table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/wotmudmapper.configs.lua", wotmudmapper.configs) else wotmudmapper:echo("Color not known.\n", false, true) end

Alias.name: Color Legend
Alias.script:
--syntax: colorlegend
cecho("<light_goldenrod>Map Legend\n") for k, v in pairs(wotmudmapper.map_colors) do cecho(" <"..v..">" .. k .. "<reset>\n") end

Alias.name: Change Room Color
Alias.script:
--syntax: cre environment --set current room to a particular environment type
local env = string.lower(matches[2])
if table.size(wotmudmapper.currentID) == 1 then if wotmudmapper.map_colors[env] then setRoomEnv(wotmudmapper.currentID[1], wotmudmapper.room_type_env_nums[env]) wotmudmapper:echo("Type of current room changed to <"..wotmudmapper.map_colors[env]..">"..env.."<reset>.
") updateMap() else wotmudmapper:echo("Type of room ("..env..") not known.
",false,true) end else wotmudmapper:echo("Current room not known.
",false,true) end

Alias.name: Change Mapping Environment
Alias.script:
--syntax: cme environment --make the rooms you're mapping all of a particular environment type
local env = string.lower(matches[2])
if wotmudmapper.map_colors[env] then wotmudmapper.configs.envcolor = wotmudmapper.room_type_env_nums[env] wotmudmapper:echo("New rooms will be of type <"..wotmudmapper.map_colors[env]..">"..env.."<reset>.\n") table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/wotmudmapper.configs.lua", wotmudmapper.configs) else wotmudmapper:echo("Type of room ("..matches[2]..") not known.\n",false,true) end

Alias.name: Reset Map Colors
Alias.script:
--syntax: map colors reset
wotmudmapper.map_colors = table.deepcopy(wotmudmapper.default_map_colors) wotmudmapper:echo("Map colors reset to default values.\n") table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/wotmudmapper.map_colors.lua", wotmudmapper.map_colors) wotmudmapper:setMapColors()

Alias.name: Change Map Colors
Alias.script:
local env = string.lower(matches[2]) local color = matches[3]
if wotmudmapper.map_colors[env] ~= nil then if color_table[color] then wotmudmapper:echo( "Map color for (" .. env .. ") changed from (<" .. wotmudmapper.map_colors[env] .. ">" .. wotmudmapper.map_colors[env] .. "<reset>) to (<" .. color .. ">" .. color .. "<reset>).
" ) wotmudmapper.map_colors[env] = color table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/wotmudmapper.map_colors.lua", wotmudmapper.map_colors) wotmudmapper:setMapColors() else wotmudmapper:echo("Color not known.
", false, true) end else wotmudmapper:echo("Mapper window key (" .. env .. ") not known.
", false, true) end

Alias.name: Add Line Horizontal
Alias.script:
--syntax example: hline nw 3e
local place = matches[2] local num = tonumber(matches[3]) local dir = matches[4] local offsets = {nw = {-1.5, 1.5}, ne = {1.5, 1.5}, sw = {-1.5, -1.5}, se = {1.5, -1.5}} if table.size(wotmudmapper.currentID) == 1 and offsets[place] then local areaID = getRoomArea(wotmudmapper.currentID[1]) local pos1, pos2, pos3 = getRoomCoordinates(wotmudmapper.currentID[1]) local x = offsets[place][1] local y = offsets[place][2] x = pos1 + x y = pos2 + y x = x - 0.75 y = y + 0.15 if dir == "w" then x = x - 3 * num end local directory = getMudletHomeDir().."/map image labels/horizontalmarker" .. num .. ".png" createMapImageLabel(areaID, directory, x, y, pos3, 1.5 + 3 * num, 0.3, 100, false) else wotmudmapper:echo("Current room not known, or invalid location/direction specification.\n",false,true) end

Alias.name: Add Line Vertical
Alias.script:
--syntax example: vline nw 3s
local place = matches[2] local num = tonumber(matches[3]) local dir = matches[4] local offsets = {nw = {-1.5, 1.5}, ne = {1.5, 1.5}, sw = {-1.5, -1.5}, se = {1.5, -1.5}} if table.size(wotmudmapper.currentID) == 1 and offsets[place] then local areaID = getRoomArea(wotmudmapper.currentID[1]) local pos1, pos2, pos3 = getRoomCoordinates(wotmudmapper.currentID[1]) local x = offsets[place][1] local y = offsets[place][2] x = pos1 + x y = pos2 + y x = x - 0.15 y = y + 0.75 if dir == "n" then y = y + 3 * num end local directory = getMudletHomeDir().."/map image labels/verticalmarker" .. num .. ".png" createMapImageLabel(areaID, directory, x, y, pos3, 0.3, 1.5 + 3 * num, 100, false) else wotmudmapper:echo("Current room not known, or invalid location/direction specification.\n",false,true) end

Alias.name: Make Text Label
Show Possible Colors
Alias.script: openUrl("https://wiki.mudlet.org/images/c/c3/ShowColors.png")

Alias.name: Mapping On/Off
Alias.script:
--syntax: mapping
wotmudmapper.configs.mapping = not wotmudmapper.configs.mapping wotmudmapper:echo("Mapping is: " .. (wotmudmapper.configs.mapping and "<green>on<reset>.\n" or "<red>off<reset>.\n")) table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/wotmudmapper.configs.lua", wotmudmapper.configs)

Alias.name: Bothways
Alias.script:
--syntax: map bothways --toggle whether rooms are connected in both directions when mapping (i.e. use one way exits or no)
wotmudmapper.configs.bothways = not wotmudmapper.configs.bothways wotmudmapper:echo("Bothways set to: " .. (wotmudmapper.configs.bothways and "<green>on<reset>.\n" or "<red>off<reset>.\n")) table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/wotmudmapper.configs.lua", wotmudmapper.configs)

Alias.name: Autojoin
Alias.script:
--syntax: map autojoin --toggle whether rooms should autojoin to nearby rooms when mapping
wotmudmapper.configs.autojoin = not wotmudmapper.configs.autojoin wotmudmapper:echo("Autojoin set to: " .. (wotmudmapper.configs.autojoin and "<green>on<reset>.\n" or "<red>off<reset>.\n")) table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/wotmudmapper.configs.lua", wotmudmapper.configs)

Alias.name: Make Brief
Alias.script:
--syntax: map brief
wotmudmapper.configs.mapbrief = not wotmudmapper.configs.mapbrief wotmudmapper:echo("Mapper will now " .. (wotmudmapper.configs.mapbrief and "hide" or "show").." room descriptions.\n") table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/wotmudmapper.configs.lua", wotmudmapper.configs)

Alias.name: Force New Room
Alias.script:
--syntax: forceroom --Will force the next room created to be a new room
wotmudmapper.configs.forceroom = true wotmudmapper:echo("Forcing new room.\n") table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/wotmudmapper.configs.lua", wotmudmapper.configs)

Alias.name: Debug
Alias.script:
--syntax: map debug
wotmudmapper.configs.dbug = not wotmudmapper.configs.dbug wotmudmapper:echo("Map debug set to: " .. (wotmudmapper.configs.dbug and "<green>on<reset>.\n" or "<red>off<reset>.\n")) table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/wotmudmapper.configs.lua", wotmudmapper.configs)

Alias.name: Display or hide zone name
Alias.script:
wotmudmapper.configs.showzone = not wotmudmapper.configs.showzone
wotmudmapper:echo("Mapper will now "..(wotmudmapper.configs.showzone and "show" or "hide").." zone names.\n") table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/wotmudmapper.configs.lua", wotmudmapper.configs)

Alias.name: Map Offline
Alias.script:
--syntax: map offline --toggle whether you can move map in offline mode
wotmudmapper.configs.offline = not wotmudmapper.configs.offline wotmudmapper:echo("Offline set to: " .. (wotmudmapper.configs.offline and "<green>on<reset>.\n" or "<red>off<reset>.\n")) table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/wotmudmapper.configs.lua", wotmudmapper.configs)
if wotmudmapper.configs.offline then enableKey("Offline Map") enableAlias("Offline Map Dirs") enableAlias("Offline Map Look") else disableKey("Offline Map") disableAlias("Offline Map Dirs") disableAlias("Offline Map Look") end

Alias.name: Offline Map Dirs
Alias.script: offlineMove(matches[2])

Alias.name: Offline Map Look
Alias.script:
if table.size(wotmudmapper.currentID) == 1 then local newid = wotmudmapper.currentID[1] centerview(newid) cecho("<cyan>"..getRoomName(newid).."
") cecho(getRoomUserData(newid,"description")) cecho("
Exits: [ ") local exits = {} for k, v in pairs(getRoomExits(newid)) do table.insert(exits,string.sub(k,1,1)) end exits = table.n_intersection({"n","e","s","w","u","d"},exits) for k,v in pairs(exits) do cecho(v.." ") end cecho("]") if wotmudmapper.configs.showzone then cecho("
<"..wotmudmapper.configs.zonecolor..">Zone: " .. getRoomUserData(wotmudmapper.currentID[1], "zone")) end for k, v in pairs(exits) do if getRoomUserData(wotmudmapper.currentID[1], v) ~= "" then cecho("
<"..wotmudmapper.configs.doorcolor..">Door " .. v .. ": <white>" .. getRoomUserData(wotmudmapper.currentID[1], v)) end end cecho("

") else cecho("Room not known!") end

Alias.name: Reset Queue
Alias.script:
--syntax: resetqueue
local numcoms = wotmudmapper.queue.last - wotmudmapper.queue.first + 1 wotmudmapper.queue = List:new() wotmudmapper:echo("Queue reset. "..numcoms.." command(s) was/were removed.\n")

Alias.name: Find Room
Alias.script:
--syntax: findroom roomname zone zonename OR findroom roomname local roomname, zonename if matches[5] then roomname = matches[6] else roomname = matches[3] end local foundrooms = searchRoom(roomname, false, true) if table.is_empty(foundrooms) then foundrooms = searchRoom(roomname, false, false) end if not matches[5] then zonename = matches[4] for k, v in pairs(foundrooms) do if string.lower(getRoomUserData(k, "zone")) ~= string.lower(zonename) then foundrooms[k] = nil end end end if table.is_empty(foundrooms) then wotmudmapper:echo("No matches found.
", false, true) elseif table.size(foundrooms) == 1 then wotmudmapper:echo("One matching room found. Map has been centered on this room.
") for k, v in pairs(foundrooms) do centerview(k) end else wotmudmapper:echo("Multiple matches found.
", false, true) for k, v in spairs(foundrooms) do cechoLink( "Room ID: " .. k .. ", <ansi_cyan>room name<reset>: " .. getRoomName(k) .. ", <" .. wotmudmapper.configs.zonecolor .. ">zone<reset>: " .. getRoomUserData(k, "zone") .. "
", [[centerview(]] .. k .. [[)]], "Click to center map on room.", true ) end cecho("") end

Alias.name: Update Map
Alias.script:

wotmudmapper:echo("Downloading updated map...\n") local url="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/weisluke/WoTMUD/master/WoTMUD_map.dat" local saveto = getMudletHomeDir() .. "/WoTMUD_map.dat" downloadFile(saveto, url)

") local res = saveMap(dir) if res then wotmudmapper:echo("Map saved.
") else wotmudmapper:echo("Map failed to save.
",false,true) end

Alias.name: Map Window Config Alias
Alias.script:
local key = matches[2] local val = matches[3] if wotmudmapper.configs.map_window[key]~=nil then if key == "w" then if (not tonumber(val)) or (tonumber(val) < 1) then wotmudmapper:echo("Width must be a positive number (interpreted as a percentage of screen width).
",false,true) else val = val.."%" wotmudmapper.configs.map_window[key] = val wotmudmapper:echo("Map window ("..key..") updated to ("..val..").
") table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/wotmudmapper.configs.lua", wotmudmapper.configs) wotmudmapper:showMap(true) end elseif key == "h" then if (not tonumber(val)) or (tonumber(val) < 1) then wotmudmapper:echo("Height must be a positive number (interpreted as a percentage of screen height).
",false,true) else val = val.."%" wotmudmapper.configs.map_window[key] = val wotmudmapper:echo("Map window ("..key..") updated to ("..val..").
") table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/wotmudmapper.configs.lua", wotmudmapper.configs) wotmudmapper:showMap(true) end elseif key == "x" then if not tonumber(val) then wotmudmapper:echo("X position must be a number (interpreted as a percentage of screen width).
",false,true) else val = val.."%" wotmudmapper.configs.map_window[key] = val wotmudmapper:echo("Map window ("..key..") updated to ("..val..").
") table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/wotmudmapper.configs.lua", wotmudmapper.configs) wotmudmapper:showMap(true) end elseif key == "y" then if not tonumber(val) then wotmudmapper:echo("Y position must be a number (interpreted as a percentage of screen height).
",false,true) else val = val.."%" wotmudmapper.configs.map_window[key] = val wotmudmapper:echo("Map window ("..key..") updated to ("..val..").
") table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/wotmudmapper.configs.lua", wotmudmapper.configs) wotmudmapper:showMap(true) end else wotmudmapper:echo("Key ("..key..") unable to be changed through this alias.
",false,true) end else wotmudmapper:echo("Map window key (" .. key .. ") not known.
", false, true) end

Alias.name: Map Zoom
Alias.script: local val = matches[2] if (not tonumber(val)) or (tonumber(val) < 1) then wotmudmapper:echo("Zoom must be a positive number (closer to 1 = more zoomed in).\n", false, true) else val = tonumber(val) wotmudmapper.configs.map_window.zoom = val wotmudmapper:echo("Map window (zoom) updated to (" .. val .. targeting = targeting or {}
if matches[3] then targeting.first = matches[4] if colors[targeting.first] then cecho("First target is set as: <" .. colors[targeting.first] .. ">" .. targeting.first .. "<reset>.
") else cecho("First target is set as: <gold>" .. targeting.first .. "<reset>.
") end elseif targeting.first then if colors[targeting.first] then cecho("First target is set as: <" .. colors[targeting.first] .. ">" .. targeting.first .. "<reset>.

") end else cecho("<red>Target not set!
") end

Alias.name: Reset Tic Timer
Alias.script: --syntax: resettictimer timer = {} timer.on = true timer.tic_time = 60 timer.num_tics = -1 timer.tic_is_early = true timer.tic_is_late = false tictimer = tictimer or createStopWatch() resetStopWatch(tictimer) temptimer = temptimer or {} for k, v in pairs(temptimer) do killTimer(v) end cecho("<green>Tic timer reset!\n")

Alias.name: Toggle Timer
Alias.script: --syntax: tictimer timer = timer or {} if timer.on then timer.on = false tictimer = tictimer or createStopWatch() resetStopWatch(tictimer) temptimer = temptimer or {} for k, v in pairs(temptimer) do killTimer(v) end cecho("<red>Tic timer OFF!\n") else timer.on = true timer.tic_time = 60 timer.num_tics = -1 timer.tic_is_early = true timer.tic_is_late = false tictimer = tictimer or createStopWatch() resetStopWatch(tictimer) temptimer = temptimer or {} for k, v in pairs(temptimer) do killTimer(v) end cecho("<green>Tic timer ON and reset!\n") end

Alias.name: Set Tic Length
Alias.script: --syntax: ticlength seconds --ex: ticlength 60.271 local ticlength = tonumber(matches[2]) timer = {} timer.on = true timer.tic_time = ticlength timer.num_tics = -1 timer.tic_is_early = true timer.tic_is_late = false tictimer = tictimer or createStopWatch() resetStopWatch(tictimer) temptimer = temptimer or {} for k, v in pairs(temptimer) do killTimer(v) end cecho("<green>Tic timer reset!\n")

Alias.name: Portal Stones
Alias.script:
local location = matches[2] local pattern = nil
container = container or {}
if location == "sh" then pattern = "touch circle with an upside down triangle inside a triangle bisected by a wavy line" elseif location == "thr" then pattern = "touch circle with an upside down triangle inside two horizontal wavy lines intersected by a crenelated line" elseif location == "ij" then pattern = "touch circle with an upside down triangle inside two interlocking diamonds" elseif location == "mirk" then pattern = "touch circle with an upside down triangle inside two half-circles connected by a vertical line" elseif location == "altara" then pattern = "touch circle with an upside down triangle inside two right leaning diagonal lines" elseif location == "evilbraem" then pattern = "touch circle with an upward pointing triangle inside two half-circles connected by a vertical line" elseif location == "tremalking" then pattern = "touch circle with an upside down triangle inside two interlocking triangles pointing up" elseif location == "passgate" then pattern = "touch circle with an upside down triangle inside a diamond with a circle within" elseif location == "maredo" then pattern = "touch circle with an upside down triangle inside two vertical straight lines" elseif location == "rhuidean" then pattern = "touch circle with an upside down triangle inside left pointing triangle containing lightning bolt arrow" else cecho("Unknown location. Locations are:\nSH, THR, IJ, MIRK, ALTARA, MAREDO, EVILBRAEM, TREMALKING, PASSGATE, RHUIDEAN\n") end
if pattern then send("get disc column") send(pattern) if container.first then send("put disc " .. container.first) else send("put disc pack") end end

") -- description = desctable[2] -- j = 3 -- while desctable[j] do -- description = description .. "
" .. desctable[j] -- j = j + 1 -- end -- setRoomUserData(i, "description", description) -- end -- i = i + 1 -- end

Alias.name: The Ways
Alias.script:
--syntax: setways area
--lua createMapLabel(27, "TV", 0, 0, 0, 255, 255, 255, 0, 0, 0, 73, 37, false, false) --TV,EF,Spine,Blight,Tanchico,Jafar,Seandar local ways = { TV = {16912,17370, 18157,17419}, EF = {16932, 17436, 17364, 16904,19656}, Spine = {16918, 17432, 17384}, Blight = {17388, 16911, 18177}, Tanchico = {16923, 17440, 17382, 16899}, Jafar = {16934, 18169,19654,17375}, Seandar = {16930, 17386, 18162}, } if ways[matches[2]] then wotmudmapper.queue=List:new() local exits = wotmudmapper.roomexits if not table.index_of(exits, "u")then table.insert(exits, "u") end wotmudmapper.currentID = wotmudmapper:findMatchingExits(ways[matches[2]], exits) if table.is_empty(wotmudmapper.currentID) then wotmudmapper:echo("No matches found.
",false,true) elseif table.size(wotmudmapper.currentID) > 1 then wotmudmapper:echo("Multiple matches found.
",false,true) else centerview(wotmudmapper.currentID[1]) end else cecho("<red>Waygate not known!
") end

Alias.name: Gate to
Alias.script:

"/"..char.name.."_gatecodes.lua", gatecodes) end if gatecodes[location] then if char.sex == "female" then send("embrace") send("channel 'gate' " .. gatecodes[location]) elseif char.sex == "male" then send("seize") send("channel 'gate' " .. gatecodes[location]) else cecho("<red>Error! Character sex not known.\n") end else cecho("<red>Unknown error! No code known for this location.\n") end else cecho("<red>Error! Character name not known.\n") end

") end end

Alias.name: ^juggle(.*)$
Alias.script:
local name = matches[2]
local cur_time = 0 local delay = 2.0 local function sendDelayedCommand(com) tempTimer(cur_time,[[send("]]..com..[[")]]) cur_time = cur_time + delay end
sendDelayedCommand("tstick") sendDelayedCommand(", grabs two colored balls, seemingly plucking them out of thin air.") sendDelayedCommand(", starts juggling the two balls between his hands.") sendDelayedCommand(",'s hands move faster as a third and fourth ball join the two already in his hands.") sendDelayedCommand(", juggles the four balls in his right hand while stifling a yawn with his left.") sendDelayedCommand(", looks around the room focusing on "..name..".") sendDelayedCommand(", casually strolls over to "..name.." while continuing to juggle the balls in his right hand.") sendDelayedCommand(", says 'Excuse me, "..name.."? Have you seen my fifth ball by any chance?'") sendDelayedCommand(", inspects "..name..", the red ball almost dropping to the floor.") sendDelayedCommand(", says 'Aha! There it is!'") sendDelayedCommand(", pulls a fifth blue ball from behind "..name.."'s ear, adding it to the ever growing circle in his right.") sendDelayedCommand(", makes his way over to the middle of the room stumbling over a barrel, seeming to barely keep the balls from falling to the ground. Out of nowhere, a sixth white ball has now joined the rest.") sendDelayedCommand(", thinks while he scratches his mouth, now holding a seventh black ball in his hand.") sendDelayedCommand(", continues juggling the seven balls in his two hands, making a sideways figure eight.") sendDelayedCommand(", starts to sweat as he wiggles his bottom, making a yellow ball fall from behind his back.") sendDelayedCommand(", kicks the yellow ball with the heel of his boot, sending it flying over his head.") sendDelayedCommand(", snatches the yellow ball with his left hand, adding it to the flying balls.") sendDelayedCommand(", looks around the room, his face an image of concentration.") sendDelayedCommand(",, with a flurry of motion, sends the balls straight in the air.") sendDelayedCommand(", makes a backflip onto a chair, letting the colored balls fall, four into each sleeve.")

Alias.name: test_moving_alias
Alias.script:
local com = matches[1]
comlist = com:gmatch("%d*[neswud]")
for v in comlist do local num = v:split("[neswud]")[1] local dir = v:split(num)[2] or v:split(num)[1]
if num == "" then num = 1 end
for i=1,tonumber(num),1 do send(dir,false) end end

Alias.name: ^disclaimer$
Alias.script: local cur_time = 0 local delay = 4.0 local function sendDelayedCommand(com) tempTimer(cur_time,[[send("]]..com..[[")]]) cur_time = cur_time + delay end sendDelayedCommand("Say Warning! This program may contain graphic content not suitable for all audiences. It contains graphic violence, strong sexual content, and/or crude, indecent language.") sendDelayedCommand("Emote talking more quickly he continues, 'Please continue at your own risk, those with weak stomachs may wish to sit in the back.'") sendDelayedCommand("Say As before the Gleeman Clan is in no way responsible for any incident from the time you entered the tavern till the time you leave.") sendDelayedCommand("Say No matter how drunk we may become, These events include, but are not limited to: temporary/full loss of hearing and/or sight, Loss of limb, or loss of life.") sendDelayedCommand("Say In the case that you think you may be dying, please remain quiet while the performance in on going, to interrupt is just rude, just because you think you're dying, doesn't mean all eyes have to be one you.") sendDelayedCommand("Say After such a time that the performance is over, please advise the Gleeman that you think you are dying.") sendDelayedCommand("Say But there is little that he/she will be able to do for you, we're not Aes Sedai, or Widsoms, we're Gleemen.") sendDelayedCommand("Say But as you are dying, please remain seated, and out of the walk ways, you wouldn't want to make anyone step over your dying body in their attempt to leave.") sendDelayedCommand("Say Remember this night isn't about you. It's about everyone, so don't hog all the attention to yourself.") sendDelayedCommand("Say If at any time for any reason, you begin to bleed as a result of your own actions or those directly associated with the performing Gleeman.") sendDelayedCommand("Say Please clean up your blood, that's just sick, and I'm not going to touch that stuff, and we like to treat our local barmaids well.") sendDelayedCommand("Say Without any further delay, let the performance begin.")

Script.name: sysSendAllProfiles
deleteOldProfiles script
Script.script:
function deleteOldProfiles(keepdays_arg, delete_maps)
--[[ Deletes old profiles/maps in the "current"/"map" folders of the Mudlet home directory. The following files are NOT deleted: - Files newer than the amount of days specified as an argument to deleteOldProfiles(), or 31 days if not specified. - One file for every month before that. Specifically: The first available file of every month prior to this. Setting the second argument to true will delete maps instead of profiles. (e.g. deleteOldProfiles(10, true)) --]]
local keepdays = tonumber(keepdays_arg) or 31 local profile_table = {} local used_last_mod_months = {} local slash = (string.char(getMudletHomeDir():byte()) == "/") and "/" or "\\" local dirpath = getMudletHomeDir()..slash..(delete_maps and "map" or "current") local delnum = 0
-- Traverse the profiles folder and create a table of files: for filename in lfs.dir(dirpath) do if filename~="." and filename~=".." then profile_table[#profile_table+1] = {name = filename, last_mod = lfs.attributes(dirpath..slash..filename, "modification")} end end
-- Sort the table according to last modification date from old to new: table.sort(profile_table, function (a,b) return a.last_mod < b.last_mod end)
echo(string.format("\nDeleting old %s. Files newer than %d days and one profile for every month before that will be kept.", delete_maps and "maps" or "profiles", keepdays)) for i,v in ipairs(profile_table) do local days = math.floor(os.difftime(os.time(), v.last_mod)/86400) local last_mod_month = os.date("%Y/%m", v.last_mod) if days > keepdays then -- For profiles older than X days, check if we already kept a table for this month: if not table.contains(used_last_mod_months, last_mod_month) then -- If not, do nothing and mark this month as "kept". used_last_mod_months[#used_last_mod_months+1] = last_mod_month else -- Otherwise remove the file: local success, errorstring = os.remove(dirpath..slash..v.name) if success then delnum = delnum + 1 else cecho("\n<red>ERROR: "..errorstring) end end end end echo(string.format("\nDeletion complete. %d/%d files were removed successfully.", delnum, #profile_table)) end

Script.name: Initialization
Script.script:
wotpack_installer = wotpack_installer or {} wotpack_installer.aliases = { "communications_aliases", "containers_aliases", "doors_aliases", "gating_aliases", "horses_aliases", "lights_aliases", "mapper_aliases", "master_mob_aliases", "pk_aliases", "player_numbers_aliases", "targeting_aliases", "tic_timer_aliases", "vials_aliases", "vote_wotmud_aliases", "weapons_aliases", "wotmud_wiki_search_aliases", } wotpack_installer.keys = {"mapper_keys", "numpad_keys"} wotpack_installer.scripts = { "alt_timer_scripts", "communications_scripts", "mapper_scripts", "player_numbers_scripts", "status_bar_scripts", "tic_timer_scripts", "vote_wotmud_scripts", } wotpack_installer.timers = {"status_bar_timers"} wotpack_installer.triggers = { "character_status_color_triggers", "communications_triggers", "delete_lines_triggers", "gating_triggers", "hp-mv-sp_colors_triggers", "locates_triggers", "mapper_triggers", "melee_colors_triggers", "miscellaneous_triggers", "player_numbers_triggers", "room_highlights_triggers", "status_bar_triggers", "tic_timer_triggers", "weave_colors_triggers", }
wotpack_installer.help = [[ <cyan>WoTMUD Package Installer Help<reset>
This script allows you to install various things from https://github.com/weisluke/WoTMUD Any already installed files with the same name will be uninstalled, so that the newly downloaded ones can be installed.
When inputting file names and types, capitalization does not matter. You may substitute underscores with spaces however, as they will be appropriately filled in as needed.
Commands are as follows:
<yellow>wotpack help<reset> - Display this help file <yellow>wotpack update<reset> - Download and install the latest version of this installer package from github. This will make sure that you have the most up-to-date list of available files <yellow>wotpack install all<reset> - Download and install ALL triggers/aliases/scripts/timers/keys/buttons from github <yellow>wotpack uninstall all<reset> - Uninstalls ALL triggers/aliases/scripts/timers/keys/buttons that were downloaded from github <yellow>wotpack install name type<reset> - Download and install one particular file with the given name and type. Example: wotpack install mapper triggers <yellow>wotpack uninstall name type<reset> - Uninstall the file with the given name and type <yellow>wotpack install name<reset> - Downloads and installs any triggers/aliases/scripts/timers/keys/buttons with the given name prefix Example: wotpack install mapper, will install the mapper triggers/aliases/scripts necessary for it to work <yellow>wotpack uninstall name<reset> - Uninstall any triggers/aliases/scripts/timers/keys/buttons with the given name prefix Example: wotpack uninstall mapper
Type <yellow>wotpack view files<reset> to view currently available files
]]

Script.name: Installer Echo
Script.script:
function wotpack_installer:echo(what, err) local install_tag = "<lawn_green>(<forest_green>wotpack_installer<lawn_green>): <white>" local err_tag = "<coral>(<red>error<coral>): <white>"
if what:sub(0,1)=="\n" then cecho("\n") what = what:sub(2) end cecho(install_tag) if err then cecho(err_tag) end cecho(what) end

Script.name: WoTPackInstallerBase
Script.script: function WoTPackInstallerBase(event, filename) -- is the file that downloaded ours? if not filename:find("wotpack_installer.mpackage", 1, true) then return end uninstallPackage("wotpack_installer") wotpack_installer:echo("Old wotpack_installer package uninstalled.\n") installPackage(filename) wotpack_installer:echo("New wotpack_installer package successfully installed.\n") end

Script.name: WoTPackInstallerUpdateFile
Script.script: function WoTPackInstallerUpdateFile(event, filename) local _,fname = filename:match("(.+)/(.+).xml") if not fname then return end local _,ftype = fname:match("(.+)_(.+)") -- is the file that downloaded a valid one? if not table.contains(wotpack_installer[ftype],fname) then return end uninstallPackage(fname) wotpack_installer:echo("Old "..fname.." uninstalled.\n") installPackage(filename) wotpack_installer:echo("New "..fname.." successfully installed.\n") end

Script.name: WoTPackInstallerSuccess
Script.script: function WoTPackInstallerSuccess(_, name) --if installed file is not the desired one if name ~= "wotpack_installer" then return end --otherwise, display help message setFont("Comic Sans MS") cecho(wotpack_installer.help) end

Script.name: WoTPackDownloadInstall
Script.script: --assumes fname is lowercase and has had any spaces replaced with underscores function WoTPackDownloadInstall(fname, ftype) if not io.exists(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/wotpack_installer_downloads") then lfs.mkdir(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/wotpack_installer_downloads") end if not io.exists(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/wotpack_installer_downloads/" .. ftype) then lfs.mkdir(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/wotpack_installer_downloads/" .. ftype) end local dname = fname .. "_" .. ftype local path_end = ftype .. "/" .. dname .. ".xml" local url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/weisluke/WoTMUD/master/" .. path_end local saveto = getMudletHomeDir() .. "/wotpack_installer_downloads/" .. path_end wotpack_installer:echo("Downloading updated " .. dname .. "...\n") downloadFile(saveto, url) end

ScriptGroup.name: Mapper

Script.name: Mapper Display Echo
Script.script:
function wotmudmapper:echo(what, debug, err) local map_tag = "<lawn_green>(<forest_green>wotmudmapper<lawn_green>): <white>" local debug_tag = "<deep_sky_blue>(<royal_blue>debug<deep_sky_blue>): <white>" local err_tag = "<coral>(<red>error<coral>): <white>"
if debug and not self.configs.dbug then return end if what:sub(0,1)=="\n" then cecho("\n") what = what:sub(2) end cecho(map_tag) if debug then cecho(debug_tag) end if err then cecho(err_tag) end cecho(what) end

Script.name: Set Map Colors
Script.script: function wotmudmapper:setMapColors() for k, v in pairs(self.map_colors) do local r, g, b = unpack(color_table[v]) setCustomEnvColor(self.room_type_env_nums[k], r, g, b, 255) end updateMap() end

Script.name: Set Map Configuration Values
MapOnSysConnectionEvent
Script.script:
function MapOnSysConnectionEvent(event) wotmudmapper.queue = List:new() wotmudmapper:setConfigs()
wotmudmapper:showMap(wotmudmapper.configs.map_window.visible)
wotmudmapper:setMapColors() wotmudmapper.currentID={wotmudmapper.configs.roomID} centerview(wotmudmapper.currentID[1])
disableKey("Offline Map") disableAlias("Offline Map Dirs") disableAlias("Offline Map Look")
addMapMenu("Update room information") addMapEvent("onMapUpdateRoomName", "onMapUpdateRoomName", "Update room information", "Update room name") addMapEvent("onMapUpdateRoomDesc", "onMapUpdateRoomDesc", "Update room information", "Update room description")
registerAnonymousEventHandler("onMapUpdateRoomName", "onMapUpdateRoomName") registerAnonymousEventHandler("onMapUpdateRoomDesc", "onMapUpdateRoomDesc") end

Script.name: MapOnSysDisconnectionEvent
WoTMUDMapUpdate
Script.script: function WoTMUDMapUpdate(event, filename) -- is the file that downloaded ours? if not filename:find("WoTMUD_map.dat", 1, true) then return end wotmudmapper:echo("Download complete.\n") loadMap(filename) wotmudmapper:echo("New map successfully uploaded.\n") wotmudmapper:setMapColors() end

Script.name: Show Map
Script.script:
function wotmudmapper:showMap(bval) local visible = bval self.configs.map_window.visible = visible local configs = self.configs.map_window local x, y, w, h = configs.x, configs.y, configs.w, configs.h
wotmudmapper.container = wotmudmapper.container or Adjustable.Container:new( { name = "mapper_container", adjLabelstyle = "background-color:rgba(220,220,220,100%); border: 5px groove grey;", buttonstyle=[[ QLabel{ border-radius: 7px; background-color: rgba(140,140,140,100%);} QLabel::hover{ background-color: rgba(160,160,160,50%);} ]], buttonFontSize = 10, buttonsize = 20, titleText = "WoTMUD Map", titleTxtColor = "black", padding = 15 } ) wotmudmapper.container:move(x, y) wotmudmapper.container:resize(w,h) wotmudmapper.mapper = mapper or Geyser.Mapper:new({name = "mapper", x = "0%", y = "0%", width = "100%", height = "100%"}, wotmudmapper.container)
setMapZoom(configs.zoom)
if visible then wotmudmapper.container:show() else wotmudmapper.container:hide() end
x = tonumber(string.sub(x,1,-2)) y = tonumber(string.sub(y,1,-2)) w = tonumber(string.sub(w,1,-2)) h = tonumber(string.sub(h,1,-2))
if x < 0 then x = x+100 end if y < 0 then y = y + 100 end if configs.dock then if x + 0.5*w > 50 then wotmudmapper.container:attachToBorder("right") else wotmudmapper.container:attachToBorder("left") end else wotmudmapper.container:attachToBorder("float") end end

Script.name: Map Window Reposition
Script.script:
function mapFinishedRepositioning(eventName, containerName, width, height, x, y) if containerName ~= "mapper_container" then return end local mx, my = getMainWindowSize() x = x/mx*100 y = y/my*100 width = width/mx*100 height = height/my*100
wotmudmapper.configs.map_window.x = x.."%" wotmudmapper.configs.map_window.y = y.."%" wotmudmapper.configs.map_window.w = width.."%" wotmudmapper.configs.map_window.h = height.."%" table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/wotmudmapper.configs.lua", wotmudmapper.configs)
wotmudmapper:showMap(true) end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("AdjustableContainerRepositionFinish", "mapFinishedRepositioning")

Script.name: Map Help
Map Right Click to Update Room Information
Script.script:
function onMapUpdateRoomName(event) local rooms = getMapSelection()["rooms"] if table.size(rooms)==0 then wotmudmapper:echo("No room selected.
",false,true) elseif table.size(rooms)~=1 then wotmudmapper:echo("More than one room selected.
",false,true) else wotmudmapper:echo("Room name for room ID ("..rooms[1]..") updated from ("..getRoomName(rooms[1])..") to ("..wotmudmapper.roomname..")
") setRoomName(rooms[1],wotmudmapper.roomname) end updateMap() end
function onMapUpdateRoomDesc(event) local rooms = getMapSelection()["rooms"] if table.size(rooms)==0 then wotmudmapper:echo("No room selected.
",false,true) elseif table.size(rooms)~=1 then wotmudmapper:echo("More than one room selected.
",false,true) else wotmudmapper:echo("Room description for room ID ("..rooms[1]..") updated.
") setRoomUserData(rooms[1], "description", wotmudmapper.roomdesc) end updateMap() end

Script.name: trackMapCommands
Script.script:
--if command is a direction, look, or flee, add to list of commands affecting map movement (wotmudmapper.queue) --pushes first letter of command (made lowercase), such that wotmudmapper.queue always contains lowercase, single letters
function trackMapCommands(event, command) if isMovement(command) or isLook(command) or isFlee(command) then wotmudmapper.queue:pushright(string.sub(string.lower(command), 1, 1)) wotmudmapper:echo("Added command (" .. command .. ") to queue.\n", true) if wotmudmapper.following then wotmudmapper.following = false end end end

Script.name: isMovement
Script.script:
--return true if command is a direction, false if not a direction. ignores capitalization
function isMovement(com) if com ~= nil then local lowcom = string.lower(com) if table.contains( { "n", "no", "nor", "nort", "north", "e", "ea", "eas", "east", "s", "so", "sou", "sout", "south", "w", "we", "wes", "west", "u", "up", "d", "do", "dow", "down", }, lowcom ) then return true end end return false end

Script.name: isLook
Script.script:
--return true if command is a look, false if not a look. ignores capitalization
function isLook(com) if com ~= nil then local lowcom = string.lower(com) if table.contains({"l", "lo", "loo", "look"}, lowcom) then return true end end return false end

Script.name: isFlee
Script.script:
--return true if command is a flee, false if not a flee. ignores capitalization
function isFlee(com) if com ~= nil then local lowcom = string.lower(com) if table.contains({"f", "fl", "fle", "flee"}, lowcom) then return true end end return false end

ScriptGroup.name: Performing room searches bases on various criteria

Script.name: Find Room
Script.script:
--returns the ID of the room with matching name/desc/exits, or empty list
function wotmudmapper:findRoom(name, desc, exits) --initialiasing tables. initial matches based on roomnames, and empty list of possible matches local initrooms = searchRoom(name, true, true) local roommatches = {} --if rooms with same name exist if not table.is_empty(initrooms) then for k, v in pairs(initrooms) do --if brief mode on, add all rooms with matching names to possible matches if self.brief then table.insert(roommatches, k) --if brief mode off, check description before adding elseif getRoomUserData(k, "description") == desc then table.insert(roommatches, k) end end --if more than one possible match, narrow based on exits if table.size(roommatches) > 1 then roommatches = self:findMatchingExits(roommatches, exits) end end return roommatches end

Script.name: Find Room Matches Usings Exits
Script.script:
--assumes exits is of the form {"n","e","s"}
function wotmudmapper:findMatchingExits(roomIDs, exits) local roommatches = {} local exitkeys, firstcomp, secondcomp, alldoors --initialiasing table for k, v in pairs(roomIDs) do exitkeys = {} --create table of exit keys (grabbing first letter of "north","south",etc.) for kk, vv in pairs(getRoomExits(v)) do table.insert(exitkeys, string.sub(kk, 1, 1)) end --if there are exit stubs leading to unmapped room, include those if getExitStubs(v) then for kk, vv in pairs(getExitStubs(v)) do table.insert(exitkeys, string.sub(self.exitmap[vv], 1, 1)) end end --comparison tables of exits seen vs exits from room firstcomp = table.n_complement(exits, exitkeys) --comparison tables of exits in room vs exits seen secondcomp = table.n_complement(exitkeys, exits) --if room exits match seen exits, insert room into possible matches if table.is_empty(firstcomp) and table.is_empty(secondcomp) then table.insert(roommatches, v) --if room has extra exits from seen exits --and ALL extra exits are doors (which could be hidden and closed) --then add room to possible matches elseif table.is_empty(firstcomp) and not table.is_empty(secondcomp) then alldoors = true for kk, vv in pairs(secondcomp) do if getRoomUserData(v, vv) == "" then alldoors = false break end end if alldoors then table.insert(roommatches, v) end end end return roommatches end

Script.name: Find Room After Flee
Script.script:
--assumes lastexits is of the form {"north":roomID1,"south":roomID2} --and currexits is of the form {"n","s"}
function wotmudmapper:findRoomAfterFlee(name, description, currexits, lastexits) --initialiasing table. local roommatches = {} --if name/desc of connecting room match name/desc given, add to table for k, v in pairs(lastexits) do if name == getRoomName(v) then if self.brief then table.insert(roommatches, v) elseif description == getRoomUserData(v, "description") then table.insert(roommatches, v) end end end --if more than 1 match, and narrowing by exits doesn't give empty result, then narrow by exits if table.size(roommatches) > 1 and (not table.is_empty(self:findMatchingExits(roommatches, currexits))) then roommatches = self:findMatchingExits(roommatches, currexits) end return roommatches end

Script.name: Find Room After Movement
Script.script:
--assumes lastexits is of the form {"north":roomID1,"south":roomID2}
function wotmudmapper:isNearRoom(com, name, desc, lastexits) local newID --for every connecting room from last known ID for k, v in pairs(lastexits) do --if exit into room matches direction, check dark/name/brief, and set ID based on result if string.sub(k, 1, 1) == com then if self.dark then newID = v break elseif name == getRoomName(v) then if self.brief then newID = v break elseif desc == getRoomUserData(v, "description") then newID = v break end end end end return {newID} end

ScriptGroup.name: Functions used during room creation and alteration

Script.name: createRoom
Script.script:
--assumes wotmudmapper.roomexits is of the form {"n","e","s","w","u","d"} --returns list containing only new room ID
function wotmudmapper:createRoom(x, y, z, areaID) --create new room ID local newID = createRoomID() addRoom(newID) --set room name, description, zone, coordinates, area, and environment setRoomName(newID, self.roomname) setRoomUserData(newID, "description", self.roomdesc) setRoomUserData(newID, "zone", self.zone) setRoomCoordinates(newID, x, y, z) setRoomArea(newID, areaID) setRoomEnv(newID, self.configs.envcolor) --if room has exits, create exit stubs if not table.is_empty(self.roomexits) then for k, v in pairs(self.roomexits) do setExitStub(newID, self.exitmap[v], true) end end wotmudmapper:echo("New room created. ID: ("..newID.."), name: ("..self.roomname..").\n",true) return {newID} end

Script.name: linkRooms
Script.script:
--assumes exits are for second room and of the form {"n","e","s","w","u","d"}, and direction is lowercase single letter
function wotmudmapper:linkRooms(firRoomID, secRoomID, dir, exits) local complements = {n = "s", e = "w", s = "n", w = "e", u = "d", d = "u"} --set exit from first room to second room in direction setExit(firRoomID, secRoomID, self.exitmap[dir]) self:echo("Linked room ("..firRoomID..") to room ("..secRoomID..") with a/an ("..dir..") exit.\n",true) --if meant to set directions both ways if self.configs.bothways then --check exits in second room for k, v in pairs(exits) do --if one is complement of dir, add exit from second room to first room if v == complements[dir] then setExit(secRoomID, firRoomID, self.exitmap[v]) self:echo("Linked room ("..secRoomID..") to room ("..firRoomID..") with a/an ("..v..") exit.\n",true) break end end end end

Script.name: Set offset
Script.script:
--assumes com is a lowercase single letter --gives coordinate offset based on direction
function wotmudmapper:setCoordinatesOffset(x, y, z, com) if com == "n" then return x, y + 3, z elseif com == "e" then return x + 3, y, z elseif com == "s" then return x, y - 3, z elseif com == "w" then return x - 3, y, z elseif com == "u" then return x, y, z + 3 elseif com == "d" then return x, y, z - 3 end end

Script.name: autoJoinRooms
Script.script: function wotmudmapper:autoJoinRooms(roomID) --initializing variables local complements = {n = "s", e = "w", s = "n", w = "e", u = "d", d = "u"} local areaID = getRoomArea(roomID) local firstExits = {} local roomList local x, y, z = getRoomCoordinates(roomID) local a, b, c --if roomID has exit stubs, add them to table of exits if getExitStubs(roomID) then for k, v in pairs(getExitStubs(roomID)) do table.insert(firstExits, string.sub(self.exitmap[v], 1, 1)) end end --for every exit stub for k, v in pairs(firstExits) do local secondExits = {} --find what coordinates would be offset in the stub direction --and get list of rooms at the offset position a, b, c = self:setCoordinatesOffset(x, y, z, v) roomList = getRoomsByPosition(areaID, a, b, c) --if only one room at offset position if table.size(roomList) == 1 then --if that room has stubs, add them to list if getExitStubs(roomList[0]) then for kk, vv in pairs(getExitStubs(roomList[0])) do table.insert(secondExits, string.sub(wotmudmapper.exitmap[vv], 1, 1)) end --compare exit stubs from second room to exit stubs from first room --and join appropriately for kk, vv in pairs(secondExits) do if vv == complements[v] then setExit(roomID, roomList[0], self.exitmap[v]) self:echo("Linked room ("..roomID..") to room ("..roomList[0]..") with a/an ("..v..") exit.\n",true) setExit(roomList[0], roomID, wotmudmapper.exitmap[vv]) self:echo("Linked room ("..roomList[0]..") to room ("..roomID..") with a/an ("..vv..") exit.\n",true) end end end end end end

Script.name: createDoor
Script.script:
--assumes direction is a lowercase single letter
function wotmudmapper:createDoor(currentID, direction, status, doorname) if direction ~= "d" and direction ~= "u" then setDoor(currentID, direction, status) end --store door direction and name in room user data setRoomUserData(currentID, direction, doorname) --echo message based on door type local doortype = {"visible", "hidden", "locked"} local doorcolor = {"green", "yellow", "red"} if status ~= 0 then self:echo( "<" .. doorcolor[status] .. ">" .. doortype[status] .. "<reset> door (" .. direction .. ") named (" .. doorname .. ") created.\n" ) end end

Script.name: isSearch
Script.script:
--return true if command is search, false if not search. ignores capitalization
function isSearch(com) if com ~= nil then local lowcom = string.lower(com) if table.contains({"sea", "sear", "searc", "search"}, lowcom) then return true end end return false end

Script.name: lookingForDoors
Script.script:
--set mapper door direction based on look or searches
function lookingForDoors(event, command) local lowcom = string.lower(command) lowcom = string.split(lowcom) while table.index_of(lowcom, "") do table.remove(lowcom, table.index_of(lowcom, "")) end
if table.size(lowcom) == 2 then if (isSearch(lowcom[1]) or isLook(lowcom[1])) and isMovement(lowcom[2]) then wotmudmapper.door = string.sub(lowcom[2], 1, 1) end end end

ScriptGroup.name: Functons for displaying areas and rooms

Script.name: Show Room List
Script.script:
function wotmudmapper:showRoomList(areaid) local listcolor, othercolor = "DarkSlateGrey", "LightSlateGray" local roomlist, endresult = getAreaRooms(areaid) or {}, {} -- obtain a roomname list for each of the room IDs we got for _, id in pairs(roomlist) do endresult[id] = getRoomName(id) end
table.sort(roomlist) --display formatting cecho( string.format( "<%s>List of all rooms in <%s>%s<%s> (areaID: <%s>%s<%s>, rooms: <%s>%d<%s>):\n", listcolor, othercolor, getAreaTableSwap()[areaid], listcolor, othercolor, areaid, listcolor, othercolor, #roomlist, listcolor ) ) -- use pairs, as we can have gaps between room IDs for _, roomid in spairs(roomlist) do local roomname = endresult[roomid] cecho(string.format("<%s>%10s", othercolor, roomid)) cecho(string.format("<%s>: <%s>%s<%s>.\n", listcolor, othercolor, roomname, listcolor)) end resetFormat() end

Script.name: Show Area List
Script.script:
function wotmudmapper:showAreaList() local totalroomcount = 0 local rlist = getAreaTableSwap() local listcolor, othercolor = "DarkSlateGrey","LightSlateGray"
-- count the amount of rooms in an area, taking care to count the room in the 0th -- index as well if there is one -- saves the total room count on the side as well local function countrooms(areaid) local allrooms = getAreaRooms(areaid) or {} local areac = (#allrooms or 0) + (allrooms[0] and 1 or 0) totalroomcount = totalroomcount + areac return areac end
cecho(string.format("<%s>List of map areas (click to view room list for an area):
",listcolor)) for id, area in spairs(rlist) do if rlist[id] then cecho(string.format("<%s>%10d ", othercolor, id)) fg(listcolor) echoLink(string.format("%-30s (%d rooms)",rlist[id],countrooms(id)), [[wotmudmapper:showRoomList(]]..id..[[)]], "View the room list for "..rlist[id], true) echo("
") end end cecho(string.format("<%s>Total number of rooms: %s
", listcolor, totalroomcount)) end

Script.name: offlineMove
Script.script:
function offlineMove(direction) if table.size(wotmudmapper.currentID) == 1 then local newid local exits = getRoomExits(wotmudmapper.currentID[1]) for k, v in pairs(exits) do ---search for every linked Room with the current room if string.sub(k, 1, 1) == direction and roomExists(v) then newid=v break end end
if newid then wotmudmapper.currentID={newid} wotmudmapper.zone = getRoomUserData(wotmudmapper.currentID[1], "zone") centerview(newid) cecho("<cyan>"..getRoomName(newid).."
") cecho(getRoomUserData(newid,"description")) cecho("
Exits: [ ") exits = {} for k, v in pairs(getRoomExits(newid)) do table.insert(exits,string.sub(k,1,1)) end if getExitStubs(newid) then for k, v in pairs(getExitStubs(newid)) do table.insert(exits,string.sub(wotmudmapper.exitmap[v],1,1)) end end exits = table.n_intersection({"n","e","s","w","u","d"},exits) for k,v in pairs(exits) do cecho(v.." ") end cecho("]") if wotmudmapper.configs.showzone then cechoLink("
<"..wotmudmapper.configs.zonecolor..">Zone: " .. wotmudmapper.zone, function() if wotmudmapper.zone ~= "" then if wotmudmapper.zone_urls[wotmudmapper.zone] ~= "" then openUrl("https://wotmud.fandom.com/wiki/"..wotmudmapper.zone_urls[wotmudmapper.zone]) end end end, "Click to open the WoTMUD wiki page for this zone", true) end for k, v in pairs(exits) do if getRoomUserData(wotmudmapper.currentID[1], v) ~= "" then cecho("
<"..wotmudmapper.configs.doorcolor..">Door " .. v .. ": <white>" .. getRoomUserData(wotmudmapper.currentID[1], v)) end end cecho("

") else cecho("Alas, you cannot go that way...

") end else cecho("Room not known!") end end

Script.name: Map Info
Script.script:
registerMapInfo("Zone info", function(roomId, selectionSize, areaId, displayedArea) return "Zone: "..getRoomUserData(roomId,"zone") end) enableMapInfo("Zone info")
registerMapInfo("Door info", function(roomId, selectionSize, areaId, displayedArea) output = "" for k, v in pairs({"north", "east", "south", "west", "up", "down"}) do local dir = string.sub(v, 1, 1) if getRoomUserData(roomId, dir) ~= "" then output = output.."Door " .. v .. ": " .. getRoomUserData(roomId, dir).."\n" end end return output end) enableMapInfo("Door info")

Script.name: Zone URLs
waysCommand
Script.script:
--STILL NEED TO DEAL WITH FLEES
function waysCommand(event, com) if wotmudmapper.inways and isMovement(com) and table.size(wotmudmapper.currentID) == 1 then local exitstubs = {} local queue = wotmudmapper.queue local currentID = wotmudmapper.currentID[1] local exits for i = queue.first, queue.last, 1 do exitstubs = {} exits = getRoomExits(currentID) if getExitStubs(currentID) then for k, v in pairs(getExitStubs(currentID)) do table.insert(exitstubs, string.sub(wotmudmapper.exitmap[v], 1, 1)) end end if table.contains(exitstubs, queue[i]) then send("sit") send("shiver") break end for k, v in pairs(exits) do if string.sub(k, 1, 1) == queue[i] then currentID = v end end end end end

ScriptGroup.name: Communications

Script.name: Communications Display Echo
Script.script:
function communications:echo(what, debug, err) local comms_tag = "<dark_khaki>(<sienna>communications<dark_khaki>): <white>" local debug_tag = "<deep_sky_blue>(<royal_blue>debug<deep_sky_blue>): <white>" local err_tag = "<coral>(<red>error<coral>): <white>"
if debug and not self.configs.dbug then return end if what:sub(0,1)=="\n" then cecho("\n") what = what:sub(2) end cecho(comms_tag) if debug then cecho(debug_tag) end if err then cecho(err_tag) end cecho(what) end

Script.name: Set Communications Configuration Values
Script.script: function communications:setConfigs() local defaults = self.defaults or {} local configs = self.configs or {} -- load stored configs from file if it exists if io.exists(getMudletHomeDir().."/communications.configs.lua") then self:echo("Loading communications configurations.\n") table.load(getMudletHomeDir().."/communications.configs.lua",configs) self:echo("Communications configurations loaded.\n") end -- overwrite default values with stored config values configs = table.update(defaults, configs) self.configs = table.deepcopy(configs) table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/communications.configs.lua", self.configs) end

Script.name: CommsOnSysDisconnectionEvent
Show Comms
Script.script:
function communications:showComms(bval) local visible = bval self.configs.comms_window.visible = visible local configs = self.configs.comms_window local x, y, w, h = configs.x, configs.y, configs.w, configs.h
communications.container = communications.container or Adjustable.Container:new( { name = "communications_container", adjLabelstyle = "background-color:rgba(220,220,220,100%); border: 5px groove grey;", buttonstyle = [[ QLabel{ border-radius: 7px; background-color: rgba(140,140,140,100%);} QLabel::hover{ background-color: rgba(160,160,160,50%);} ]], buttonFontSize = 10, buttonsize = 20, titleText = "Communications", titleTxtColor = "black", padding = 15, } ) communications.current_tab = communications.current_tab or communications.tabs[1] communications.container:move(x, y) communications.container:resize(w, h)
communications.header = communications.header or Geyser.HBox:new( {name = "communications.header", x = 0, y = 0, width = "100%", height = "10%"}, communications.container )
communications.footer = communications.footer or Geyser.Label:new( {name = "communications.footer", x = 0, y = "10%", width = "100%", height = "90%"}, communications.container )
communications.footer:setStyleSheet([[ background-color: black; ]])
for k, v in pairs(communications.tabs) do communications[v .. "_tab"] = communications[v .. "_tab"] or Geyser.Label:new({name = "communications." .. v .. "_tab"}, communications.header) communications[v .. "_tab"]:setStyleSheet( [[ background-color: ]] .. communications.tab_color .. [[; border-top-left-radius: 10px; border-top-right-radius: 10px; margin-right: 1px; margin-left: 1px; ]] ) communications[v .. "_tab"]:echo("<center>" .. v) communications[v .. "_tab"]:setClickCallback("communications.click", v)
communications[v] = communications[v] or Geyser.MiniConsole:new( { name = "communications." .. v, x = "0%", y = "0%", width = "100%", height = "100%", }, communications.footer ) communications[v]:enableAutoWrap() communications[v]:setColor("black") communications[v]:setFontSize(configs.fontsize) communications[v]:bg("black") communications[v]:fg("white") communications[v]:hide() end
if visible then communications.container:show() communications[communications.current_tab]:show() else communications.container:hide() end
x = tonumber(string.sub(x, 1, -2)) y = tonumber(string.sub(y, 1, -2)) w = tonumber(string.sub(w, 1, -2)) h = tonumber(string.sub(h, 1, -2)) if x < 0 then x = x + 100 end if y < 0 then y = y + 100 end
if configs.dock then if y < h then communications.container:attachToBorder("top") else if x + 0.5 * w > 50 then communications.container:attachToBorder("right") else communications.container:attachToBorder("left") end end else communications.container:attachToBorder("float") end end
function communications.click(tab) communications[communications.current_tab]:hide() communications.current_tab = tab communications[communications.current_tab]:show() end

communications.configs.comms_window.x = x.."%" communications.configs.comms_window.y = y.."%" communications.configs.comms_window.w = width.."%" communications.configs.comms_window.h = height.."%" table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/communications.configs.lua", communications.configs)
